name: payments-service
description: Payments Proxy Service To API Platform
author: Will McVay <wmcvay@reapit.com>

scripts.local-session-table: aws dynamodb create-table --table-name Cloud_Payments_Session_Table --attribute-definitions AttributeName=id,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=id,KeyType=HASH --billing-mode PAY_PER_REQUEST --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000
scripts.local-config-table: aws dynamodb create-table --table-name Cloud_Payments_Config_Table --attribute-definitions AttributeName=clientCode,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=clientCode,KeyType=HASH --billing-mode PAY_PER_REQUEST --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000
scripts.start: concurrently "docker run -p 8000:8000 amazon/dynamodb-local" "yarn local-db && NODE_ENV=local tsup src/core/local-server.ts --watch --onSuccess 'node dist/local-server.js'"
scripts.conf: yarn config-manager --namespace cloud --entity payments-service --name local --mode fetch
scripts.commit: yarn test --coverage --no-cache --silent --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --runInBand --watch=false && jest-coverage-badges --input src/tests/coverage/coverage-summary.json --output src/tests/badges && yarn lint --fix && yarn check
